synopsis.text: It has been 10 years since Kouji Kabuto piloted the super robot Mazinger Z and defeated the evil Dr. Hell and his Underground Empire, saving humanity. Now a scientist himself, Kouji discovers a mysterious lifeform buried deep below Mount Fuji. This encounter leads to a new threat to mankind, forcing Kouji to make a decision that will determine the future of humanity - will Mazinger Z save the world again or destroy it? Though once a hero, Kouji walks a fine line between god and demon as the fate of the world hangs in the balance. With this new challenge, the future will once more be entrusted to the mighty Mazinger Z.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
